title: 急！！！生成地皮
author: 一起走
txt_content: 怎么生成地皮世界  求详细解释

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
安装地皮插件，多世界插件
输入/mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe

replies.author: 一起走
replies.txt_content:
